name: Anime Slider Puzzle
description:
Solve this slider puzzle with 180, anime themed images!

A slide puzzle isthe one where the aim is to sort the given pieces, using a blank slot for movement.

High quality images, works equally great on phones and tablets!

Fan made pictures!

Our features:

★ 8 (3x3), 15 (4x4), 24 (5x5) and 35 (6x6) block boards

★ 9 different theme

★ 20 pictures for every theme

★ 180 pictures to solve

★ Guaranteed solution for all puzzles

★ Lightweight & supports SD Card install

★ Numbers at the tile's corner to help

Slider puzzles help to improve the thinking power, agility, hand-eye coordination and patience of children.

★ Easy to play

★ HD graphics

★ Great, fan pictures
